remarks: Lemma for ~ tchcph : homogeneity.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tchval.n $e |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) $.
tchcph.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
tchcph.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
tchcph.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
tchcph.2 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) $.
tchcph.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
tchcph.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. K /\ x e. RR /\ 0 <_ x ) ) -> ( sqrt ` x ) e. K ) $.
tchcph.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V ) -> 0 <_ ( x ., x ) ) $.
tchcph.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
tchcph.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
tchcphlem2.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
tchcphlem2.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
tchcphlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( sqrt ` ( ( X .x. Y ) ., ( X .x. Y ) ) ) = ( ( abs ` X ) x. ( sqrt ` ( Y ., Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d ., x $.
$d .x. x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
